remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個列舉型別 (Enumeration) 會與 的 屬性及 類別的 屬性一起使用。This enumeration is used with the property of the and the property of the classes. 如果訊息容易遭受摘要式攻擊 （例如，如果訊息很短或 entropy 很低），您應該使用 SignBeforeEncryptAndEncryptSignature 或 EncryptBeforeSign 選項。If a message is vulnerable to a digest attack (for example, if the message is short or the entropy is low), you should use the SignBeforeEncryptAndEncryptSignature or EncryptBeforeSign option. (*Entropy*是伺服器、 用戶端，或兩者，所提供的隨機資料，用來建立共用的金鑰來加密或解密資料。)(*Entropy* is random data provided by a server, a client, or both, and is used to create a shared key for encrypting and decrypting data.) ## 何謂已排序？What Is Ordered? WCF 提供了三個不同保護層級，以決定訊息的方式使用 SOAP 訊息安全性保護。WCF offers three different protection levels that determine how messages are secured using SOAP message security. 預設為 SignBeforeEncryptAndEncryptSignature。The default is SignBeforeEncryptAndEncryptSignature. 這個設定會先簽署訊息，再加密訊息本文，然後加密 XML 簽章。This setting first signs the message, encrypts the message body, and then encrypts the XML signature. 這可以降低密碼編譯猜測攻擊成功破解簽章的可能性。This reduces the likelihood of a successful cryptographic guessing attack against the signature. 不過，使用這個預設值對於效能具有另一層含意。However, using the default has performance implications. 實際上，安全性提高會使得效能產生折衷。In effect, there is a tradeoff of performance for increased security. 加密簽章可能降低 10% 至 40% 之間的效能。Encrypting the signature can decrease performance between 10 percent and 40 percent. 如果訊息的資料內容低的值，而且效能量比較重要時，使用 SignBeforeEncrypt。If the data content of the message is of low value, and performance throughput is more significant, use SignBeforeEncrypt. 使用這項設定時，簽章摘要會以純文字格式傳送，如此一來，訊息更容易因其 Entropy 較低而遭受「猜測驗證法」(Guess-and-verify) 攻擊。With this setting, the signature digest is sent in clear text, and thus the message is more vulnerable to guess-and-verify attacks on low entropy. ## 僅限自訂繫結Custom Bindings Only 為了變更 `MessageProtectionOrder` 屬性，此時必須建立自訂安全性繫結。To change the `MessageProtectionOrder` property requires the creation of a custom security binding. 如需建立自訂繫結的詳細資訊，請參閱[Creating User-Defined 繫結](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/creating-user-defined-bindings.md)。For more information about creating custom bindings, see [Creating User-Defined Bindings](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/creating-user-defined-bindings.md). 如需建立特定驗證模式的自訂繫結的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 為指定的驗證模式建立 SecurityBindingElement](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/how-to-create-a-securitybindingelement-for-a-specified-authentication-mode.md)。For more information about creating a custom binding for a specific authentication mode, see [How to: Create a SecurityBindingElement for a Specified Authentication Mode](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/how-to-create-a-securitybindingelement-for-a-specified-authentication-mode.md). ##
